long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track your water intake, and get simple reminders to drink more water right on your new tab page.

- Hourly Reminders
The best way to stay hydrated is to drink water gradually throughout the day. As you create more browser tabs, Hydrotab will remind you to drink a glass of water. 

- Set your own goal
Everybody is different, and there’s no one-size-fits-all rule for how much water a person needs in a day. Set your own water goal, and casually track you water intake throughout the day.
